extension.description:
This Kodi add-on can be used to watch all video content from VRT NU.
- Track the programs you follow - List all videos alphabetically by program, by category or by channel - Watch live streams from Eén, Canvas, Ketnet and Ketnet Junior - Discover recently added or soon offline content - Browse the online TV guides or search VRT NU
[B]The VRT NU add-on is provided 'as is' without any warranty of any kind, and is not endorsed by VRT.[/B]
